channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@ariella_kay @Shmarya No, according to the article it’s just providing assistance in applying for state grants. The former BJE presumably notifies all the schools — including the chassidische ones — when grant applications are available, and provides some assistance in filling out the forms.

@ariella_kay @Shmarya That’s not going to make them responsible for any misbehavior by a staff member, even if the salary was paid by a grant they assisted with.
item.source:markdown:
@ariella_kay @Shmarya No, according to the article it’s just providing assistance in applying for state grants. The former BJE presumably notifies all the schools — including the chassidische ones — when grant applications are available, and provides some assistance in filling out the forms.
@ariella_kay @Shmarya That’s not going to make them responsible for any misbehavior by a staff member, even if the salary was paid by a grant they assisted with.

item.description: @ZacharyBraiterm @Shmarya @jh_swanson But also, Israel is a long way from facing imminent destruction. The fact is that if all foreign policy were handed to AIPAC nemesis Andy Levin for the next decade, Israel would survive. Pro-Israel messaging is bogosity all the way down.
item.source:markdown: @ZacharyBraiterm @Shmarya @jh_swanson But also, Israel is a long way from facing imminent destruction. The fact is that if all foreign policy were handed to AIPAC nemesis Andy Levin for the next decade, Israel would survive. Pro-Israel messaging is bogosity all the way down.

item.description: Theme song for this morning’s meeting with two of the three editors of a forthcoming volume. Pub date was set as April 19. Which is the day after another title which was rescheduled at a meeting yesterday. Hmmmm. https://t.co/BEOV7aZlRp

item.description:
Rightly or wrongly, “Forever Autumn” is on my Elul playlist. https://t.co/cocRWokcZp

Which has some nice additions since last year. https://t.co/7q9LY6Be3s

Speaking of which: Spotify thinks I should add these songs. Should I? Discuss! https://t.co/1Nlf0hnOfB

item.description:
@Dem_Bitz I’m an outsider, and there should be insiders who can answer better, but my sense is they’re functionally synonyms. You can say Chabad chasidim or Lubavitch chasidim and though they mean slightly different things, I think they can be used interchangeably.

@Dem_Bitz My guess is you’re more likely to see Chabad used within the movement (since it’s their mission/belief statement) and less likely by other chasidim, who aren’t ready to cede the first three sefirot to the folk from Lubavitch.
item.source:markdown:
@Dem_Bitz I’m an outsider, and there should be insiders who can answer better, but my sense is they’re functionally synonyms. You can say Chabad chasidim or Lubavitch chasidim and though they mean slightly different things, I think they can be used interchangeably.
@Dem_Bitz My guess is you’re more likely to see Chabad used within the movement (since it’s their mission/belief statement) and less likely by other chasidim, who aren’t ready to cede the first three sefirot to the folk from Lubavitch.

item.description: @rmneiss Meme: Hazony poised between two red buttons, sweating the decision. One is labeled “opposed women’s sufferage.” The other: “Preached and practiced universal love and harmony.”
